page.title: 17Glassmaking in Kirk Sandall.
page.content: There are two large glass-making factories in the area of the Block - Rockware and Pilkingtons.{Rockware} are concerned with making glass jars and bottles. They make two different types of glass -{flint glass}which is clear for things like milk bottles, and{opal glass}which is a white glass. In the factory there are three flint furnaces and two opal. Bottles start off in the "hot end" of the factory and are then taken to the decorating department where advertisements can be painted onto bottles by machine. From there they are packed and sent to various dairies. {Pilkingtons}polish a different type of glass -{plate glass} - which is used as window or safety glass. Local sand is one of the raw materials used, which is obtained from just outside this Block.
